title: "Chip machine maker ASML will grow into a $500 billion business next year, tech investors predict"
excerpt: "ASML, a Dutch firm that makes high-tech machines used in semiconductor manufacturing, will see its market value climb from $302 billion to more than $500 billion next year, according to two tech investors."
